channel.title: Some Ideas
channel.description:
Hi, I'd like to know what you guys think of my ideas on Tos-Scape v4
1) I want the game to be played all on 1 island/cave (Island/cave? What Island/Cave?) 2) Should I make a custom client? 3) I fixed the shops, they are all operated by commands now 4) Rares = Rare 5) FireCape = Hard to get 6) Dragon = very expensive 7) Money = earned by working, lvling, etc.. 8) Slower lvling
Now I'd like you guys to post your ideas, and "rate" mine :)
Thanks for reading :)
Jens

item.title: Some Ideas
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:6, topic:123169”]well, just edit your client java, and stop the rares becoming “easy” to get…[/quote]What else?

[quote=“watzupmeg, post:7, topic:123169”]what does imo mean?[/quote] In My Opinion (stop spamming plz!)

[quote=“Called enzo, post:8, topic:123169”][quote] author=Called enzo link=topic=172912.msg1596786#msg1596786 date=1184432094]
try to find a non-used island =) i know many but i aint telling =) im using for mine
[/quote][quote]Yep I know, that’s my sort of goal, I’ll try to find my RS map :)[/quote]

Maybe i give u some … idk yet first i need to have a source( )[/quote] Gimme Gimme!! lol thx

[quote=“watzupmeg, post:9, topic:123169”]i kno an island how about that moon shaped island north west i think on rs map not sure?

or maby u could use a dungoun and block all ladders off maby?[/quote]
Yea that’s cool, Lunar Isle…
Yea a dungeon is a great idea to, thx!

[quote=“zilchuary, post:10, topic:123169”]damn leecher… look at my thread…[/quote]what?

Oh, I have a question! Is the Island “Harmony” In the 317 clients? (It’s in the very south east)[br][size=1]Posted on: 14-07-2007, 14:05:48[/size][hr]Ok so The main idea is :
You start in a cave, with some basic training spots (In the cave you can’t lose items).
There are 3 ladders, Attack, Strength, Defence, once you reached lvl 50 in one of these skills you can click the ladder.
If you click the ladder you’ll be teleported to some island (Not sure what Island yet). But you won’t be able to leave the island (This because of the fact the people will talk to eachother etc.)
How does this sounds?

Read full topic

item.title: Some Ideas
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:2, topic:123169”]I’ve always wanted to see a more realistic private server, but with more accessibility to rares, etc. A client is a good idea, but there are quite a few people with online clients, have you thought about maybe a Visual Basic Client you download? and it has an iframe of an online client. A good island would be Karamja, but with a different look, like not a jungle. If I can think of more, I’ll post it.[/quote]K, thx I’m not making a online client, If I make one it’ll be a downloadable one
Yea but Karamja is pretty known by everyone, I’d like to use a unknown island…

[quote=“watzupmeg, post:3, topic:123169”]how about the tut island maby or ape toll?[/quote] Ape toll is used in several sources…
Tut island is to big to imo.
Thx anyway! :)[quote=“Called enzo, post:4, topic:123169”]try to find a non-used island =) i know many but i aint telling =) im using for mine :D[/quote] Yep I know, that’s my sort of goal, I’ll try to find my RS map

Read full topic

item.title: Some Ideas
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I’ve always wanted to see a more realistic private server, but with more accessibility to rares, etc. A client is a good idea, but there are quite a few people with online clients, have you thought about maybe a Visual Basic Client you download? and it has an iframe of an online client. A good island would be Karamja, but with a different look, like not a jungle. If I can think of more, I’ll post it.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Ideas

item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Hi, I’d like to know what you guys think of my ideas on Tos-Scape v4

  1. I want the game to be played all on 1 island/cave (Island/cave? What Island/Cave?)
  2. Should I make a custom client?
  3. I fixed the shops, they are all operated by commands now
  4. Rares = Rare
  5. FireCape = Hard to get
  6. Dragon = very expensive
  7. Money = earned by working, lvling, etc…
  8. Slower lvling

Now I’d like you guys to post your ideas, and “rate” mine

Thanks for reading
